title: Refine compose helper proofs for reuse
description: Verify compose helper proofs so adapters retain interoperability when chained.
intent: | Functor composition helper: compose two FunctorInstance values sharing a middle category, with proofs for identity and composition.
acceptance: All Agda modules compile without errors
